value:
I've sworn to return Prince Lewyn to
Silesse no matter what. I cannot allow
either of us to die before that!

All the Heroes work hard in service
of this country... I must pull my
weight too. I won't be left behind!

The battles seem to go on with
no end in sight... Why not rest?
I will tend to matters for you.

When next we have an opportunity,
would you go shopping with me?$k$pI'm hoping to get some fine clothes
like I see others in the castle wear.

I brush my pegasus often. It clears
out the pests and helps bring out
the coat's shine.$k$pIt takes some strength too, so it also
serves as a way to build muscle.

I am Erinys, a pegasus knight of
Silesse. I've come with a delivery
from $Nf.

I am no longer the person I once was.
I will never be called a crybaby again!

As a pegasus knight of Silesse, I will
fight in the service of Queen Lahna
and Prince Lewyn with pride!

I'll never reach my goal if this
keeps up...

Huh. This feels unusual somehow...
I want to help out even more now!

I am Erinys, a pegasus knight of
Silesse. Like my sister, I am one
of the Four Heavenly Knights.$k$pI ask that you not look down on
me because of my inexperience.

Thank you ever so much for your
kindness, helping me when I'd nearly
lost all I had on me...$k$pI was caught up looking at all the
shops, I let my eyes drift from my
belongings for a moment, and...$k$pWell, if I was alone, I would probably
be left with only my own tears.$k$pI finally became a pegasus knight like
I always dreamed, but I mustn't let
myself feel so secure.$k$pI am not at my sister's level just yet.$k$pI've come to think of my being
summoned here as a new way
for me to train and get stronger.$k$pI want to prove I am a knight who
can stand apart in my own right!$k$pBut before that, I should prove
I can shop by myself, I suppose...
I will be more careful next time!$k$pHey! Please don't laugh!
はいっ
これで！
きゃあっ
なんてこと…
This won't go your way.
Make your preparations.
You underestimate me!
No forgiveness.
I did what I could, Lady Lahna...
Hehe
I am Erinys, knight of Silesse, and I would be honored to fight by your side for a time.
Oh, was there something on my uniform? *sigh*
Lord Lewyn is known as the Hero on the Wind. He inherited his might from the crusader Ced.
I was called crybaby and worse when I was younger, but I am no longer that child.
I must bring Lady Lahna some happiness.
Hmm... Lord Lewyn and Annand...?
I am glad I came to Askr. Do I seem more worldly after meeting all the other Heroes?
Per my oath.
As Fate wills.
Leave it to me.
